effect.name: Panorama Perspective
effect.author: Emil Macko (Interface by VoyVivika)
effect.description: Pixel Shader Alternative to the Perspective Object (Possibly lighter weight)

parameter.name: Horizontal Ratio
parameter.description: The ratio between the widths of the view and the background image (in pixels).

parameter.name: Vertical Ratio
parameter.description: The ratio between the heights of the view and the background image (in pixels).

parameter.name: Horizontal FOV
parameter.description: Horizontal FOV angle of the whole background image (in degrees).

parameter.name: Vertical FOV
parameter.description: Vertical FOV angle of the whole background image (in degrees).

parameter.name: Horizontal Position Factor
parameter.description: The factor of the horizontal position of the view.

parameter.name: Vertical Position Factor
parameter.description: The factor of the vertical position of the view, with respect to how much the view can move within the background image.

parameter.name: Zoom
parameter.description: The amount to zoom the image in or out, measured in the amount of the image to show (lower values = zoomed in).
